nodes.text: Carida: Heavy Duty, Part 3: War Games

Carida: Heavy Duty, Part 3: War Games is the third in the Planet Hoppers Carida: Heavy Duty article series, written by Cory J. Herndon and released on Wizards.com on September 18, 2003. The story involves Imperial Cadets Myrette Davani and Shira Brie during their Imperial Army training on Carida.
